thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 14 of 2268
thread.title: Mr J Groves
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Mr J Groves

author: Mr J Groves
title: Mr J Groves
text:
Great prices and a fraction of the cost of local supplier/installers. Fitting instructions were easy to follow and everything was in the pack that I needed to install blinds myself. Delivered very well wrapped and I am really pleased with how the blinds look.
I have purchased from Blinds2go twice recently and both times I have been really pleased with the results.
